infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: To take a profile picture Jinear needs to access your camera.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To upload a profile picture Jinear needs to access your photo library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: To save media Jinear needs to access your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: To take voice memo Jinear needs to access your microphone.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to collect in-app activity in order to improve functionalities, user engagement, help us understand crash and analytics data.
